C2 to happen many times or to happen again: The theme of freedom recurs throughout her writing. If the pain/problem/trouble, etc. recurs, come and see me.
More examplesFewer examplesWater, a symbol of life, recurs as an image throughout her poems.If the symptoms recur, visit your doctor.The theme of loss recurs throughout much of his writing.If the problem recurred, we'd have to think again.The same ideas recur throughout her books.
